page.title: 10STRATFORD MOTOR MUSEUM.
page.content: The{Motor Museum}is fairly small.The exhibition is called{The Golden Age Of {Motoring.}Most of the cars were built between 1910 & 1940.It has several {Rolls Royces,}one made in 1926.Some of the cars have starting handles, several have wooden spokes, all had mud guards.One Rolls Royce was owned by the Prime Minister of Hyderbad State,India.There's a{Mercedes}made in 1912 with wooden wheels,a sunroof & a spare wheel and a racing car which is a Light Weight Special made in 1931. There are some children's pedal cars and some old motorbikes.On the wall is a{penny farthing bicycle}from 1870, also lots of car badges.Outside is an old yellow car.We noticed there was alot of chrome on the cars.There are old petrol pumps,mechanics tools,and advertising boards,as well as costumes from the period.
